DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The aim study analyze clinical radiographic outcome 23 edentulous jaw treat 3D software planning , guide surgery , immediate loading restore Cad-Cam Zirconia titanium full arch framework . Material & method : This study design prospective clinical trial . Twenty patient consecutively rehabilitate immediately load implant support fix full prosthesis . A total 120 fixture support 23 bridge ( 8 mandible , 15 maxilla ) place , 22 fresh post extraction socket . All implant insert insertion torque 35/45 Ncm . 117 120 implant immediately load 3 delayed load . Outcome measure implant survival , radiographic marginal bone-levels bone remodeling , soft tissue parameter complication .
DOC.brief_title: Computer Assisted Implant Surgery Immediate Loading
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : edentulous patient patient hopeless teeth need restore full arch prosthesis Exclusion criterion : presence systemic disease ( i.e . haematologic disease , uncontrolled diabetes , serious coagulopathies diseases immune system ) irradiation head neck region within 12 month surgery presence severe bruxism clench habit pregnancy poor oral hygiene poor motivation return schedule followup visit
